text: Calceolaria hyssopifolia is a species of plant in the Calceolariaceae family. It is endemic to Ecuador. The Latin word hyssopifolia (which also occurs in several other plant names, including that of cuphea hyssopifolia) means "hyssop-leafed".James Donn, Hortus Cantabrigiensis: or, a Catalogue of Plants, Indigenous and Exotic (1809), p. 5 ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador hyssopifolia Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Calceolaria hyssopifolia
